ApiKey.description: The API key of your Discourse instance to use for profile retrieval

ApiUsername.description: The username of the user to use for API requests

BaseUrl.description: The base URL of your Discourse instance

BaseUrlInternal.description: The URL that MediaWiki will use to request data from Discourse. If Discourse is running on the same host as MediaWiki, you can use this option to avoid unnecessary round trips.

ConnectSecret.description: The value you set under Discourse's discourse_connect_secret setting

DefaultAvatarColor.description: The default color of the avatar background when there is no avatar image available

EnableProfile.description: Whether to enable the Discourse profile integration

GroupMap.description: A mapping of MediaWiki groups to Discourse groups and permissions.

SuppressWelcomeMessage.description: Whether to suppress the Discourse welcome message

UnixSocket.description: The path to the Unix socket that Discourse is listening on. If Discourse is running on the same host as MediaWiki and using Unix sockets, you can use this option to avoid unnecessary round trips.
